example.name: autogen2
example.text: As a result , the effort by some oil ministers to get OPEC to approve a new permanent production-sharing agreement next month is taking on increasing urgency .
example.arg: the effort by some oil ministers to get OPEC to approve a new permanent production-sharing agreement next month
